review.title: “It gave me a valuable insight into the PV industry and I also learned a lot about solar cell manufacturing processes.”
review.pros: Pros – - friendly colleagues- relaxed working atmosphere- many PV-related companies are closeby.- flat hierarchy.
review.cons: Cons – - very remote location: closest relatively big city is Leipzig - 50km away.- housing close to company is difficult to find.- faces severe Asian competition, some of the production has to be relocated.- long-term employment has more chances of success and you also feel much better integrated in the work environment if you manage to get your German to a "working knowledge" level, although most of the employees speak English relatively well.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Top notch solar company, still struggling internally five years and growing”
review.pros: Pros – Great team environment, hard working, and still likes to have fun. Great location. Good corporate support and guidance from parent co in Germany. Ability to make decisions quickly.
review.cons: Cons – Company acquired by Korean conglomerate and boy did things change! No more perks! Inefficient decision making process, too many parent companies making decisions. Communication faltered, vision and goals became a mystery.

review.pros: Pros – good company for personal development.
review.cons: Cons – too biased organisation and poor interaction among workers....

review.title: “It has been a new experience for me in the solar industry.”
review.pros: Pros – Safe place to work in Qcells. Knowledge are well transfered between counterparts. Daily tracking on the issues . Good support from HQ.
review.cons: Cons – Poor communication from management towards employees on updating on the company status. No technical development done on site. No personal development plan done.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to have clear communication to the employee. Should provide clear road map for the personal development plan.

review.title: “I am part of the pioneer team member in Q-Cells started off as Manufacturing Engineer at 2008 until now.”
